alert.note: Alert for Eastern Greenbrier; Monroe; Summers; Western Greenbrier (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 28 at 3:54AM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EDT THIS MORNING... Rainfall diminishing across this region later today, but excessive runoff from prior rainfall may result in continued flooding especially this morning. The Flood Watch is now in effect for * Portions of Virginia and southeast West Virginia, including the following areas, in Virginia, Alleghany VA, Bath, Bland, and Giles. In southeast West Virginia, Eastern Greenbrier, Monroe, Summers, and Western Greenbrier. * Until 7 AM EDT This Morning * WHEN...Until 7 AM EDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff from recent heavy rainfall may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low- lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. - Http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood

area.areaDesc: Eastern Greenbrier; Monroe; Summers; Western Greenbrier
